lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference in the world, because even the smallest action can make a difference in many ways.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a University. In my job I help students and faculty members.

lender.name: Maria & Michael
lender.loan_because: It's a small gesture on my part that could make a big difference to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a technical sales team that sells software to corporations.

lender.name: wendy
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.

lender.name: Elly
lender.loan_because: The modest amount I can afford to lend can still make a real difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Casino
lender.occupational_info: We provide you with information about free online casinos giving gamblers free chips to play at the casinos.

lender.name: Cheri R
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping others to help themselves. I am very much against handouts - I will always give the man a fish if he's hungry, but then you must teach the man to fish so he can eat for a lifetime. Helping others to build themselves up is a win-win for everyone involved. I enjoy being able to loan to help those who wish to better themselves - they are brave people and I applaud them all.

lender.name: Marie & Dustin
lender.loan_because: I wish you happiness.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people discover their own happiness.

lender.name: Rob
lender.occupation: Test pilot in a flea powder factory.

lender.name: ILONA
lender.occupational_info: Volunteering for the Foundation for Sustainable Development in La Plata, Argentina http://www.fsdinternational.org/

lender.name: Adam
lender.occupational_info: I work with documents at a generic pharmaceutical company.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I believe that "To whom much is given, much is expected". I am grateful for the opportunities I have had in my life to work hard and now I have a comfortable living. It is time to pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I manage a medical office. I run the business so that we can keep our doors open and our doctors can see patients.

lender.name: Samara
lender.loan_because: I like to make people smile, and its the least I could do.
lender.occupational_info: A little bit of everything: account mangement, accounting, facilities managment, human resources, events - the "organizer"

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: It seems like such a simple way for my children and I to make a difference. Choosing the entrepreneurs ourselves gives us a greater sense of involvement. Being able to track the progress of the entrepreneurs also makes the whole process gratifying in more ways than one.
lender.occupational_info: I am a biomedical engineer studying parasites that cause diseases mostly affecting the underdeveloped regions of the world. I hope to contribute in some small part to finding a cure to one of these diseases.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I can and everyone who can, should.

lender.name: Willemien
lender.loan_because: I am glad to have the financial space to support women who can build up an independent existence
lender.occupational_info: my job is to accompany little children ( 4 to 6 years old) to be happy playfull children

lender.name: Vera
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone start their own business, so that they may provide for their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the medical field in a business that helps patient's eyes to see better.

lender.name: Ilgaz & Damla & Gokhan
lender.loan_because: A micro-loan is the best way to give people in developing countries a chance to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I write software.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: It is helpful to others.
lender.occupational_info: I make candy to sell to stores and whoever wants to buy it, check out my website.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I am part of a girl scout troop, and we are doing this for our silver award. Also, it is a very creative way to give to charity, while getting what you give back. It is better and more unique than the usual bake sale, coat drive, etc. I thought it was really cool.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I feel very blessed and would like to share my blessings with others.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: my material needs aren't as important as someone struggling to feed their children.
lender.occupational_info: Doing my best to be a better person.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I am more than happy to help those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: quality assessment of other's work.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It is the way of the future

lender.name: Uriel
lender.loan_because: We could all use a little help
lender.occupational_info: fix helicopters

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I believe anyone who is willing to work hard for their and their families future should be given the opportunity.

lender.name: Jean & Scott
lender.loan_because: We have some money that needs to be invested and there are others that know how use the money for business ideas and services that benefit people in developing economies.
lender.occupational_info: Jean is retired from teaching English while Scott works on projects to improve the electrical system in the Detroit, Michigan, USA area

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Dreams should be funded so thoughts, words and prayers manifest into the physical world.
lender.occupational_info: I work managing software on server farms which fund people's dreams for eventual home ownership.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I am excited to join the Kiva community and witness the impacts of reaching out first hand
lender.occupational_info: I work for bank that lends money to build housing that is affordable to low income families to rent.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I can help usher in the kingdom of heaven while I'm still here.
lender.occupational_info: I've been a student for 19 years now... and you better believe I'm not going to let it all go to waste.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: We were fortunate enough to be born in a part of the world where people have easy access to the neccesities of life. We want to help other people who are less fortunate, and who are trying to help themselves make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering individuals who have the initiative to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Married, 2 children, High School Biology Teacher

lender.name: Delores
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone who wants to help themselves and their families in a positive, productive way.
lender.occupational_info: Creative

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: It's rewarding to see peoples dreams flourish thanks to help from all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and learn...

lender.name: Son Lam
lender.loan_because: Just to lend a hand to people who need it out there

lender.name: Kent
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lender.name: Par
lender.loan_because: It's the right way to do it!

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: Money and resources should flow and be shared globally to fund productive activity and support those who may not have access to credit in traditional ways.
lender.occupational_info: I work on internet-helping people find good deals in hotels across the world

lender.name: Davis
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at Seattle Pacific University studying Global Development and Economics.

lender.name: Change Microfund Inc.
lender.loan_because: Serving the worlds poorest by investing in the lives and dreams of emerging entrepreneurs; providing resources to enable them to utilize their God-given talents and in turn create long term social, economic, environmental, and spiritual change.
lender.occupational_info: About us: A win-win for us all, as we grow so do our family of entrepreneurs. We each get to participate in moving our world forward one loan, one family, one village at a time.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that I can help change lives by putting small amounts of money into circulation. It is a the gift that can keep giving!
lender.occupational_info: I help make education more accessible for students with special needs.

lender.name: Neil
lender.occupational_info: I take lots of pictures.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do!
lender.occupational_info: Disabled by fibromyalgia but I travel some and do volunteer work when able.

lender.name: Louis
lender.occupational_info: I create programs that people can use on computers.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: my money should go to something more important than what I've been spending it on.

lender.name: Pelle
lender.loan_because: Solidarity is the only way to global freedom

lender.name: Alireza
lender.loan_because: That's least I can do.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I enjoy it!
lender.occupational_info: Basically my job is all about connecting people and information

lender.name: Caue
lender.occupational_info: High Quality Translation Services

lender.name: Athol
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Engineering consulting

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who really need it.

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: I want to help. I may not have a lot of money, myself, but I have enough to help a little. If everyone helped a little it would make a huge difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student. I trim horse's feet. I'm a carpenter and build things.

lender.name: Stacia
lender.loan_because: Its my way to let people know they are loved and valued. Making a living is difficult, often for reasons that have nothing to do with the average person. I want to live in a world where people help one another when they can.
lender.occupational_info: Im a consultant that helps people follow environmental laws. I analyze impacts of human developments on the environment- the animal, water, plants, and land.

lender.name: Shaun
lender.loan_because: I have a small business too.
lender.occupational_info: I draw pictures for books and magazines, design logo's and advertisements, and fix damaged photographs on my computer.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the details and paperwork for my office, reports, travel arrangements and so forth.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I am thrilled to have an opportunity to help the less fortunate!!!
lender.occupational_info: I do research in Solar Energy

lender.name: Moriya
lender.loan_because: it takes a village.

lender.name: Rahil
lender.loan_because: I know how tough it can be to start a business and these micro loans help people who are trying to help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I'm the President/CEO of Pirani Marketing Group. I work with small to mid-size business create a marketing strategy, produce collateral, and help them succeed!

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I want the world to survive!
lender.occupational_info: I help the sick and dying.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I want to help other families
lender.occupational_info: I am 4 years old and go to school

lender.name: Tracee
lender.loan_because: Small steps, taken often enough, go a long way.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: In hard times people need to get REALLY generous.
lender.occupational_info: I study how people use softwares, in order to make computers more easy and useful.

lender.name: Sofia
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals to impact the world. I believe that empowering people to change their world will ultimately change mine.

lender.name: Scott & Sarah
lender.loan_because: The tasks before us seem less daunting when we stop and remember we can all lend a hand, one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Sarah tries to protect lenders from writing bad real estate loans that will eventually lead to foreclosures. Scott tries to keep people in their homes if borrowers do end up in foreclosure. We are all in this together.

lender.name: Mandi
lender.loan_because: our family has been blessed and we would like to share this with those less fortunate
lender.occupational_info: I create custom jewelry where I transform personal photographs into pendants to wear on necklaces and bracelets.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because:
My $25 loan can really help make a difference to someone who wants to improve his or her quality of life.
Kiva also allows for the cycle of giving to continue. Once my loan has been repaid, I can then loan again. I respect this organizational model.
lender.occupational_info: I am an academic librarian at a community college in the Midwest.

lender.name: DanaMichelle
lender.loan_because: I am greatful for what I have and I hope to help others reach their dreams.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I believe people generally are good and want to do good and be productive members of society. Sometimes they just need a little help to do that and I am currently in a position to provide that help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a major bank. My role is to redeploy our workforce into areas within the bank that need their skills and experience. We want to keep and retain our employees because they have the right experience and skills and they already know the company culture.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I hope it's an effective way to use the money to improve the world.
lender.occupational_info: I create systems that help people to use computers in their businesses.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to make it better.

lender.name: joy
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate by a friend and love the idea of people helping people who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I paint in watercolor and sell my work at street shows, through my website, via reps and directly at my studio in Cambidge, MA.

lender.name: Marla Mac
lender.loan_because: I'm giving a hand up over a handout. I love playing a part in Kiva's mission to end poverty by helping people (especially women) start their own business!
lender.occupational_info: Founder and Chief Empowerment officer at Healthy Wallet

lender.name: Rachana
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves the opportunity to take control of their lives
lender.occupational_info: I take what business users need and translate that into something a computer programmer could develop

lender.name: Bob, Irene & Claire
lender.loan_because: Giving for the joy of it! If one needs moral or ethical reasons I recommend Peter Singer's "The Life You Can Save".
lender.occupational_info: Bob: I study lakes - especially salty ones! Irene: I study plants & water Claire: I'm in school.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I conduct legal but non religious weddings and funerals in Scotland

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: 1. We are loved. 2. It ain't mine anyhoo. 3. What I share I receive more of. 4. What I receive, I share more of. :-) Woo HOOO!
lender.occupational_info: I apply myself in accordance with the will of God for the love of my fellow beings and the joy of doing it. I am a technologist with extensive experience in building successful global organizations.

lender.name: Global Village Design
lender.loan_because: others need the money more than i do....
lender.occupational_info: I create web sites using computers that are powered by electricity created from wind. I give discounts to organizations that I believe are trying to make the world better for its citizens. I donate a portion of the business proceeds to organizations such as this one....

lender.name: Delia
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of my spare cash helping other people in far-off parts of the world. It makes one feel part of a world community, informs about other peoples lives and concerns and adds interest to my life.

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: I see the work that Kiva facilitates in developing countries as a vital tool in the enrichment and enfranchisement of people and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I raise funds for charitable organizations that enables them to carry out the important work they do for people and society.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: Peter Unger's "Living High and Letting Die"

lender.name: amy
lender.loan_because: I want to help women thrive. When women thrive, children thrive, and when children thrive communities thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I push a bunch of papers around in order to appear busy :)

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: The Bible, 1 John 3:18 NRSV "Let us love, not in word or speech, but in truth and action."

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I've volunteered for hunger- and food-related causes for years and at the moment am not on any committees. So, this is a unique and meaningful way to continue to do so while I'm taking a break from active participation.
lender.occupational_info: I support a team of scientists that have an instrument on a spacecraft that's orbiting Saturn. I run websites, work with magazines, and help organize meetings.

lender.name: Simon
lender.occupational_info: I make the Internet

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.occupational_info: I design and manage websites for individuals and companies.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of people helping themselves by being given a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work with buyers who are interested in buying homes or vacant land and sellers who are interested in selling their property.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: i was given a lot - i owe a lot to the rest of the world. i'm interested in the working poor, because of the strength of character exhibited in those who are willing to try to lift themselves out of a bad situation as best they can. their work inspires me and gives me hope.
lender.occupational_info: i'm a poet, photographer and activist. i work on social justice issues, including human/civil rights and enviro/animal rights. my poetry and photograhy, i hope, reflects my interest in people, nature and place.

lender.name: Eddie
lender.loan_because: microfinance is a very good way to help people get a better life!
lender.occupational_info: Gather Financial information, analyse and transfer this information into reports

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: Life is good to me and I want to help life be good for others too
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of people who develop and deliver projects to improve highway assets

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: I am a firm believer that the Universe never abandons anyone. Organizations such as Kiva are proof of this.
lender.occupational_info: I have the privilege to help guide individuals, couples and businesses through growth, change and transition.

lender.name: SANDRA
lender.loan_because: Yo quiero desarrollar mi proyecto con las personas de la tercera edad para poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida y sentirme util.
lender.occupational_info: Es una casa de descanso para las personas de la tercera edad en donde puede desarrollar un proyecto de vida y ser autosuficientes en un medio en el cual los ancianos son una carga para la sociedad.

lender.name: Benny
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a chance at whatever they want to do.
lender.occupational_info: I make (hopefully) useful websites!

lender.name: Thomas & Elsebeth Hasen
lender.loan_because: good luck!

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have much, and with that comes the responsibility to spread the wealth around.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs that help companies make more money.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people make a difference in this world, even if its in small ways.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I think it's important for people to support and encourage people, and as a working mom, I want to do my little part to help and encourage other moms. It's a small world after all.
lender.occupational_info: I help parents who have children with disabilities know about services in their community and schools.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.occupational_info: Work in energy efficiency research and policy

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I adopted my son from Central America and want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help premature babies to breath, including life support.

lender.name: Myself
lender.loan_because: I should
lender.occupational_info: Educator

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I love being able to help people and watch them succeed!

lender.name: Niki
lender.loan_because: I would like to help in changing people's lives to the better by being creative and productive
lender.occupational_info: I am an experienced HCI Education e-learning expert, researcher, consultant, HCI designer & researcher, and online communities manager. My interests fall in the fields of Human-Computer Interaction Education, E-Learning, Idea Management for Distributed Leadership and User Innovation Networks.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: This is an opportunity to help others who are working to help themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: Retired teacher

lender.name: sherry
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by my teacher.

lender.name: Teng
lender.loan_because: sharing is one of the best ways to help!

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I have received many blessings, and believe in sharing them with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit, making people aware of the opportunities our organization provides to give to worthy causes.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people out who otherwise wouldn't get a second glance from a "traditional" bank.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a world class company that produces the BEST chocolate on earth!

lender.name: Mike and Janae
lender.loan_because: We want to help people out who normally wouldn't be able to get a traditional loan
lender.occupational_info: Mike: Provide electricity in buildings Janae: helps develop new medicines (Also a freelance artist)

lender.name: Pierre
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs to work hard to succeed in life and enjoy what they are doing
lender.occupational_info: I help people find the home of their dreams along the ocean or along a golf course in South Florida

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: Hard working people should have a chance to make their own ideas become true. Regular banks are too restrictive on that field so private action is requested.
lender.occupational_info: I am an export clerk and translator in a company producing measuring equipment and selling it on a world-wide scale.

lender.name: kevin
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and would like to share my blessings
lender.occupational_info: Support for heavy lift services in the alberta oilsands

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it is easy to get wrapped up in the microcosm of our own existence. I loan in an effort to keep a more global perspective on life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: it helps level the playing field.
lender.occupational_info: I help improve the kiva.org web site.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I am in comfortable circumstances and want to help others in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I've finished working now and enjoy being at home with my husband and cats and having time for my hobbies.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful idea. And change does come from the bottom up.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand how best to use a computer and assist in developing software.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: i know how live without money
lender.occupational_info: now i am unemployed,

lender.name: Leonardo
lender.loan_because: I can help

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I'm in need of a vehicle to find a job so I can pay for college at WMU. Luckaly my father has been letting me have free room an board at his house till I have income but nothing is looking up for me.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: This is what will change the world...many small actions by many people, just regular folks from across the world, helping regular folks.
lender.occupational_info: Oh my work looks like I serve coffee and bagels but the *real* work is bringing people together to do some good in the world.

lender.name: Abianna and Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to

lender.name: Shanna
lender.loan_because: I like to think I'm able to help farmers stay on their feet : )
lender.occupational_info: I am a veterinary student, so when I graduate in about a year I'll be a veterinarian with an interest in production and food animals, like cows, chicken, llamas, pigs and sheep. I am hoping to specialize in dairy and beef cattle medicine and consulting. I also work right now in small animal medicine, dogs and cats to help pay for school. So when you have the vet out to help care for your sick or injured cow/cat/dog/horse, that will be me soon : )

lender.name: Milan
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur I understand the power of standing on your own two feet and changing your financial stars.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase and sell distressed properties.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: this is a great way to help support people to help support themselves. It is far more productive and empowering than short term handouts.
lender.occupational_info: We specialse in eco friendly Hummer transport experiences, its busy, fast paced and can be very rewarding when taking care of peoples special occasions.

lender.name: Albert Balbutin Jr.
lender.loan_because:
Making a living and making a difference should always be the same thing.
"The everyday kindness of the back roads more than makes up for the acts of greed in the headlines."
-Charles Kuralt
lender.occupational_info: I like to write words and graphically design things that make people feel good.

lender.name: Barb
lender.occupational_info: I help take care of a friend's 2-year-old boy as well as working as a research assistant online.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: We all need help in this world.

lender.name: Kyle and Danae
lender.loan_because: We have been very blessed and we want to help change the world for others.

lender.name: Joel and Louise
lender.loan_because: of the personal connections and a sense of responsibility
lender.occupational_info: We teach in a high school and help people when they are in conflict

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: you can help someone more by providing the foundations to allow them to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a PhD Economist at the University of Warwick specialising in behavioural economics.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because:
My family and I won the birth lottery.
...have to share our good luck.

lender.name: Buff Herrington
lender.loan_because: I want to enable others to live a more prosperous life. I seek to lend to clients who aim to better the lives of their families through professions that protect poultry - selling egg, milking cows, raising sheep, fishing - all good lines of work as I see them.
lender.occupational_info: I am the leader of a flock of five hens. I am their protector, their friend, and their pillar of support in the enchanting world we live in.

lender.name: Sarah and Aaron
lender.occupational_info:
Sarah is a 5th grade teacher.
Aaron does scientific research in the field of physics.

lender.name: Carla, ric, & jinx
lender.occupational_info: artists and designers

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I receive great satisfaction knowing I am helping others to improve their lives.

lender.name: McCourt/ Morrison Fam
lender.loan_because: Our family decided to give a gift to others rather than receive birthday gifts.

lender.name: Chris Baldone
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed.

lender.name: lianne
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time college student. I study psychology. I work as a telephone interviewer for research projects. I am also an assistant to a professor at my university. I teach, plan, organize, edit, and other things. I am also a research assistant, doing research in social and personality psychology.

lender.name: steve and monica
lender.loan_because: We enjoy helping people
lender.occupational_info: Steve works for a hotel company. Monica works in a hospital

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: sharing gives me joy.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's an outreach that helps people to make permanent improvements in their lives. It is very practical too.
lender.occupational_info: I develop medical equipment to help improve the quality of life for many other people.

lender.name: Drake
lender.loan_because: It's a chance for myself to contribute to the world from the ground up by directly impacting the lives of those willing to help themselves. There isn't really a lack of food to feed the people of the world - just an unequal distribution of it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Business Finance graduate.

lender.name: The Correira Family
lender.loan_because: it feels like the right thing to do...

lender.name: Geoff & Jenny
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the chance to live their life with dignity and hope.
lender.occupational_info: We have a holiday resort that has a huge range of activities where people can come together and enjoy a holiday in Tropical Cairns

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: I beleive what comes around goes around, and sometimes people (like me), just need to be trusted and give a chance to start something great!
lender.occupational_info: I run a small business where I do full body massages. I was trained by a professional world class massuer who travels the world massaging very prosperous famous people. I have an invention I would like to start, but don't have the funds to launch!

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility to pass on the wonderful blessings that I have so graciously been entrusted with.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: would like to help..and make a difference to people's lives.

lender.name: Shadow
lender.loan_because: I believe in people who dare to dream, and work to see their dream become their reality.
lender.occupational_info: I design and create new technologies to make the world a better place for everyone. I focus my abilities on creating free sustainable energy to everyone in the world, providing a means for clean drinking water, light and warmth. My dream is to see those who dont dare to dream of having these things, enjoy them as a way of life.

lender.name: Ralph Kerle, Chairman
lender.loan_because: Our organization has a desire to assist creative leaders by tapping into our membership community to support creative and entrepreneurial endeavours at grass root levels globally
lender.occupational_info: The Creative Leadership Forum is a global network of over 15,000 senior executives from every spectrum of industry, academia and government working with members to develop and share knowledge, insights and practices in creative leadership and management innovation.

lender.name: Christophe
lender.loan_because: A little help to our fellow human beings is the least one can do when one can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for software vendor. My role is to facilitate the resolution of support cases opened by enterprise customers.

lender.name: Arleen
lender.loan_because: I believe microlending is a critical tool in the movement to eradicate global poverty. It provides entrepreneurs in developing countries with the opportunity to provide for their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently enrolled in the Masters of Public Administration program at Pace University-Pleasantville, New York.

lender.name: Ari & her mommy
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurship is important around the world and that all of us deserve an equal opportunity. I feel very blessed in my life and I am honoured to be able to help others on their way to a better life situation.
lender.occupational_info: I own a graphic/web design business. I too, started off with very little and grew up in a poor family so I understand how hard it can be. I have worked very hard to get to where I am today and because of this hard work and dedication I am able to provide my family with a very comfortable life. Always remember the key to success: 5% inspiration (idea), 95% perspiration (hard work). Good luck, i wish you the best.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: its a great way to support people in developing independence
lender.occupational_info: I provide support and assistance to people with learning difficulties

lender.name: Mike and Nat
lender.loan_because: A great way to empower people to obtain the finance they need to start or develop their enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: Solicitor/Lawyer

lender.name: John-Paul
lender.loan_because: There are honest, hard-working people out there who need an opportunity to better their lives. This is a fantastic forum through which those of us in more fortunate circumstances can facilitate the existence of those opportunities and ensure that hard work is rewarded.
lender.occupational_info: I lend to corporations and individuals in Australia on behalf of one of the largest financial institutions in the country.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Desire to help others who need a chance to show that they can be responsible and productive.
lender.occupational_info: Install / repair mechanical systems / plumbing systems....

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunity to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Social worker

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: it makes sense. There is enough for all of us & right now we are experiencing the biggest shift of wealth my generation has ever seen. To be an active part of this - well its why I'm here on Kiva and here on Earth
lender.occupational_info: I've been fortunate enough to work with entrepreneurs in the UK to follow their passion & do what they love. Now my focus is working with entrepreneurs to follow their passion through sustainable means & ensuring that a social enterprise becomes the "norm"

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I believe that even a small amount of help can sometimes make a very big difference in someone's life. Also, I like the personal touch of knowing something about who is receiving the loan.
lender.occupational_info: I design sound systems for automobiles.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.occupation: Retired staffing specialist. Now a writer.
lender.loan_because: I was given a kiva card as a christmas present. What a wonderful gift.
lender.occupational_info: I helped to find people jobs and supported them once they were hired. I work now for the U.S. Department of Peace Campaign.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: I want to see women become successful business owners to help support and educate their children for particpation in a global economy.
lender.occupational_info: I teach courses in community organizing, group work and research.

lender.name: John & Debbie
lender.loan_because: faith by itself, if it is not accompanied by action, is dead.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: Soldier in the U.S. Army

lender.name: Abby
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great idea.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I was a single mom who ran my own business to support my 4 kids. I want to help other women to have the power to provide for their families too.
lender.occupational_info: I have 3 companies - one does small business support, one is a candy store, and the other purifies and bottles water

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Access to capital is a primary success factor for all entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Helping develop green businesses that work to address our eco-challenges

lender.name: Achim Ladies & More
lender.occupational_info: We are groups of German ladies who learn English. Instead of giving our teacher a birthday present this year we have loaned through KIVA.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.occupation: Still trying to figure that out

lender.name: Jack and family
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed and want to share what God has given us
lender.occupational_info: I work on large machines that keep the insides of buildings warm in the winter and cool in the summer

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I want to give to someone who needs it. I have so much, more than I need, so I want to help those that don't have enough. If everyone gave a little, everyone would be better off

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: living where I live gives me more opportunity just by being born than millions of people across the world have despite a lifetime of hard work. I hope to reduce this imbalance.
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate contracts between the U.S. Government and a private corporation for products and services used by the U.S. military.

lender.name: Mel & Dave
lender.loan_because: I loan because it's fun and I can.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I am lucky for what I have.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I've done lots of travel to 3rd world countries such as El Salvador, Nepal and Cambodia and know that sometimes a little help can go a long way...

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing the gifts I have received during my lifetime. And, in particular, I believe in giving to those who are in more difficult and challenging situations, particularly those in other than "first world" countries.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise operations for the Union Pacific Railroad and have been with the railroad (originally Southern Pacific) for 38 years.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I accept my responsibility to make the world better. I believe in a better world. I am the Change.
lender.occupational_info: I promote websites.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: i am very poor. i can't change my life with the small amount of money i earn but maybe i can change someone who really needs it.
lender.occupational_info: Brutal and demeaning

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: its good
lender.occupational_info: treat drinking water

lender.name: Rose Fox
lender.occupational_info: I make other people's writing better.
